message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. What do you say?
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not giving up too much yet!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Meet me in the middle?
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. You're getting a better deal than before, but I'm not giving up yet!
